title: Yankee Candle Homemade HERB Lemonade Concentrated Room Spray 1.5 Ounce

description: Your very own freshly-squeezed lemonade, made with a hint of ginger and garnished with the herbs picked right from your garden.

Top: Fresh Lemon, Crushed Ginger, Mint Mid: Clary Sage, Thyme Base: Bay Leaf, Sugarcane, Vanilla Top note is the initial impression of the fragrance, middle note is the main body of the scent, and base is its final impression.

The fastest way to make any room fresh and inviting — so you and your family will always feel at home. Just two sprays instantly fill a room with your favorite true-to-life fragrance. The spray is so concentrated, you'll get up to 300 sprays of room-filling fragrance in each canister.
